parts.text: {"word":"kaki","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"柿","english_definition":"persimmon (fruit)","examples":[{"sentence":"秋になると、庭の柿の木に実がなる。","translation":"In autumn, the persimmon tree in the garden bears fruit.","usage_notes":"一般的に果物の柿を指します。","collocations":["甘柿 (amakaki - sweet persimmon)","渋柿 (shibugaki - astringent persimmon)","干し柿 (hoshigaki - dried persimmon)","柿の種 (kaki no tane - persimmon seeds (snack))"],"synonyms":["柿の実 (kaki no mi)"],"antonyms":[]},{"sentence":"柿は秋の味覚の一つだ。","translation":"Persimmon is one of the tastes of autumn.","usage_notes":"日本の秋を代表する果物です。","collocations":["秋の味覚 (aki no mikaku - autumn delicacies)"],"synonyms":[],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"日本語の「柿」から。","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/kɑːki/","syllables":"ka-ki"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"kakies (英語化された場合)"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"日本語の「柿」は、英語でも 'kaki' として使われることがあります。特に、日本の柿の種類や文化について説明する場合に使われます。一般的なpersimmonという単語も広く使われます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"I ate a persimmon, it was kaki.","correct":"I ate a persimmon, it was a kaki persimmon.","note":"kakiはpersimmonの種類を指すので、a kaki persimmonのように使います。"},{"incorrect":"I like kakis very much.","correct":"I like persimmons very much.","note":"一般的に柿が好きという場合は、persimmonsを使う方が自然です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":[],"phrasal_verbs":[],"related_terms":["persimmon","Japanese persimmon","Diospyros kaki"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低い (Relatively low, unless discussing Japanese culture)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「kaki」は日本語の「柿」を指す言葉で、英語でも使われることがあります。特に、日本の柿の種類や文化について話す場合に用いられます。一般的な「柿」を指す場合は、「persimmon」を使う方が一般的です。kakiは、persimmonの一種であることを理解しておくと良いでしょう。","example_sentences":[]}]}
